instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter.
Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty.
Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch.
Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer: BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800 Putty: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311 Colored Basecoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800 (any desired plant-mixed color) Decorative Topcoat: Using a DECORe™ brush, apply Sandino™ in light, crisscrossing strokes, spreading it as evenly as possible. Avoid lap marks by applying the product in sections. Leave a small gap in between the sections then just spot apply Sandino™ on the gaps right after to even it out.

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: DECORe™ Sandino™ should only be applied as a decorative finish on surfaces that are properly painted with a flat topcoat. For best results, the color of the flat topcoat should complement the effect of Sandino™ Gold or Sandino™ Silver. Only use the provided BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Brush. The desired finish may not be achieved if a different material is used.

calculator.title: Putty (Full)
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311
